channel.title: Turns out bots activating entities have been fixed for nodm7
channel.description: I figured out that using the mint-arena cdaef49 revision that the bots can, and will, use all the entities they come across, unlike 116ec08 where they couldn't. Good thinking on that one zturtleman!

item.title: Turns out bots activating entities have been fixed for nodm7
item.dc:creator: @coltongit Coltongit
item.description:
@coltongit wrote:

Turns out activating entities wasn’t the problem. The problem is the bots lose their LTG/NBG once they go to activate an entity.

Read full topic
item.source: Turns out bots activating entities have been fixed for nodm7

item.title: Turns out bots activating entities have been fixed for nodm7
